titles: A pleasant jigg betwixt Jack and his mistress: or, The young carman's courage cool'd by the suddain [sic] approach, of his master, who found him too kind to his mistress. Tune of Mary live long. Licensed according to order.
notes: Imperfect: trimmed with loss of imprint.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Broadsides --  England --  London --  Early works to 1800.
